48  struct equationHeader
49  {
50 
52  SourceID equationSource;
53 
54 
56  SatID equationSat;
57 
58 
63  std::set<SourceID> equationSourceSet;
64 
65 
69  std::set<SatID> equationSatSet;
70 
71 
73  Variable indTerm;
74 
75 
80  double constWeight;
81 
82 
84  equationHeader()
85  : equationSource(Variable::allSources), equationSat(Variable::allSats),
86  constWeight(1.0) {};
87 
88 
96  equationHeader( const SourceID& source,
97  const SatID& sat,
98  const Variable indep,
99  const double& cweight )
100  : equationSource(source), equationSat(sat), indTerm(indep),
101  constWeight(cweight) {};
102 
103 
108  equationHeader(const Variable& indep)
109  : equationSource(Variable::allSources), equationSat(Variable::allSats),
110  indTerm(indep), constWeight(1.0) {};
111 
112 
114  virtual equationHeader& operator=(const equationHeader& right);
115 
116 
121  virtual equationHeader& operator=(const Variable& indep)
122  { indTerm = indep; return (*this); };
123 
124 
126  virtual ~equationHeader() {};

128 
129  }; // End of struct 'equationHeader'

136  struct Equation : gnssData<equationHeader, VariableSet>
137  {
138 
140  Equation();
141 
142 
148  Equation( const equationHeader& head )
149  { header = head; };
150 
151 
157  Equation( const Variable& indep );
158 
159 
165  Equation( const TypeID& type );
166 
167 
187  Equation( const gnssEquationDefinition& gnssEq );
188 
189 
191  virtual Variable getIndependentTerm() const
192  { return header.indTerm; };
193 
194 
199  virtual Equation& setIndependentTerm(const Variable& var)
200  { header = var; return (*this); };
201 
202 
204  virtual double getWeight() const
205  { return header.constWeight; };
206 
207 
212  virtual Equation& setWeight(const double& cweight)
213  { header.constWeight = cweight; return (*this); };
214 
215 
220  virtual Equation& addVariable(const Variable& var)
221  { body.insert(var); return (*this); };
222 
223 
237  virtual Equation& addVariable( const TypeID& type,
238  StochasticModel* pModel =
239  &Variable::defaultModel,
240  bool sourceIndexed = true,
241  bool satIndexed = false,
242  double variance = 4.0e14,
243  double coef = 1.0 );
244 
245 
250  virtual Equation& removeVariable(const Variable& var)
251  { body.erase(var); return (*this); };
252 
253 
260  virtual Equation& clear()
261  { body.clear(); return (*this); };
262 
263 
265  SourceID getEquationSource() const
266  { return header.equationSource; };
267 
269  SatID getEquationSat() const
270  { return header.equationSat; };

272

277  { return header.equationSourceSet; };
278 
279 
283  std::set<SatID> getSatSet() const
284  { return header.equationSatSet; };
285 
286 
290  Equation& addSource2Set( const SourceID& source )
291  { header.equationSourceSet.insert(source); return (*this); };
292 
293 
296  Equation& addSat2Set( const SatID& sat )
297  { header.equationSatSet.insert(sat); return (*this); };
298 
299 
303  Equation& clearSourceSet()
304  { header.equationSourceSet.clear(); return (*this); };
305 
306 
310  Equation& clearSatSet()
311  { header.equationSatSet.clear(); return (*this); };
312 
313 
317  virtual bool operator<(const Equation& right) const
318  { return (header.indTerm < right.header.indTerm); };
319 
320 
322  virtual ~Equation() {};

324 
325  }; // End of struct 'Equation'

327 
328  namespace StringUtils
329  {
330  inline std::string asString(const VariableSet& vset)
331  {
332  std::ostringstream oss;
333  for( VariableSet::const_iterator it = vset.begin();
334  it != vset.end();
335  ++it )
336  {
337  oss << it->getType() << " "
338  << it->getSource() << " "
339  << it->getSatellite() << " "
340  << it->getTypeIndexed() << " "
341  << it->getSourceIndexed() << " "
342  << it->getSatIndexed()<< std::endl;
343  }
344 
345  return oss.str();
346  }
347  }
348 
350 
351 } // End of namespace gpstk
